load_hg hyperedges-contact-primary-school.txt node-labels-contact-primary-school.txt
load_pattern pattern_edges.txt pattern_node_labels.txt
match
add_vertex 1
add_vertex 2
add_vertex 3
set_vertex_label 242 2
set_vertex_label 243 3
add_vertex 1
set_vertex_label 244 1
add_vertex 2
set_vertex_label 245 2
add_vertex 3
set_vertex_label 246 3
delete_vertex 242
add_vertex 1
set_vertex_label 247 2
add_vertex 2
set_vertex_label 248 1
delete_vertex 243
add_vertex 3
set_vertex_label 249 2
add_vertex 1
set_vertex_label 250 3
add_vertex 2
set_vertex_label 251 1
delete_vertex 244
add_vertex 3
set_vertex_label 252 2
add_vertex 1
set_vertex_label 253 3
match
quit
